message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SY 

The paper discusses a second-order neural network stochastic gradient training algorithm, which is a common topic in the machine learning community. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the scaling of stepsizes, which is related to optimization algorithms, suggesting cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) as another likely category. The paper also deals with practical issues in dealing with the curvature of the cost, which could fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.CV (Computer Vision). Finally, the paper's focus on neural networks and optimization could also make cs.SY (Systems and Control) a possible category.
